mapper.select: select receive_user, read_user from sys_message_tb where msg_no = #{msg_no}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_message_tb (msg_no, msg_type, create_user, create_time, receive_role, receive_user, read_user, msg_param, msg_content, status, end_time, deal_type) values (#{msg_no}, #{msg_type}, #{create_user}, #{create_time}, #{receive_role}, #{receive_user}, #{read_user}, #{msg_param}, #{msg_content}, #{status}, #{end_time}, #{deal_type})
